SEARCH
Package bto.Controller

Class ManagerController

java.lang.Object
bto.Controller.ManagerController
public class ManagerController extends Object
Controller class for managing operations related to managers, such as creating, editing, and deleting projects, handling officer registrations, managing applications, and responding to enquiries.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a ManagerController with the specified dependencies.

  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerController

      public ManagerController(Manager manager, ProjectDao projectDao, ApplicationDao applicationDao, EnquiryDao enquiryDao)
      Constructs a ManagerController with the specified dependencies.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager associated with this controller.
      projectDao - The DAO for managing projects.
      applicationDao - The DAO for managing applications.
      enquiryDao - The DAO for managing enquiries.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public void createProject(String name, String neighborhood, Map<String,Project.FlatTypeDetails> flatTypes, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int officerSlots) throws Exception
      Creates a new project.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project.
      neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project.
      flatTypes - A map of flat types and their details.
      openingDate - The opening date for applications.
      closingDate - The closing date for applications.
      officerSlots - The number of officer slots available for the project.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an active project or other validation issues.

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(String projectName) throws Exception
      Deletes a project by its name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to delete.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the project is not found or the manager is not authorized to delete it.

    • editProject

      public void editProject(String name, String neighborhood, Map<String,Project.FlatTypeDetails> flatTypes, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int officerSlots) throws Exception
      Edits an existing project.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project.
      neighborhood - The neighborhood of the project.
      flatTypes - A map of flat types and their details.
      openingDate - The opening date for applications.
      closingDate - The closing date for applications.
      officerSlots - The number of officer slots available for the project.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the project cannot be updated.

    • viewAllProject

      public List<Project> viewAllProject()
      Retrieves all projects.
      Returns:
      A list of all projects.

    • viewOwnProjects

      public List<Project> viewOwnProjects()
      Retrieves all projects managed by the current manager.
      Returns:
      A list of projects managed by the manager.

    • viewRequestedOfficer

      public List<String> viewRequestedOfficer()
      Retrieves a list of officer registration requests, assignments, and rejections for all projects.
      Returns:
      A list of officer registration details.

    • approveRegistration

      public void approveRegistration(String projectName, String officerName) throws Exception
      Approves an officer's registration for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project.
      officerName - The name of the officer to approve.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the officer is already assigned, not requested, or there are no available officer slots for the project.

    • rejectRegistration

      public void rejectRegistration(String projectName, String officerName) throws Exception
      Rejects an officer's registration for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project.
      officerName - The name of the officer to reject.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the officer is already rejected, not requested, or assigned to the project.

    • approveApplication

      public void approveApplication(String applicationId) throws Exception
      Approves an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to approve.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the application is not found, is not pending, or there are no available units for the flat type.

    • rejectApplication

      public void rejectApplication(String applicationId) throws Exception
      Rejects an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to reject.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the application is not found, is not pending, or there are no available units for the flat type.

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal(String applicationId) throws Exception
      Approves a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to approve withdrawal for.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the application is not found, no withdrawal is requested, or the associated project is not found.

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public void rejectWithdrawal(String applicationId) throws Exception
      Rejects a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to reject withdrawal for.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the application is not found or no withdrawal is requested.

    • viewAllEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> viewAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries from the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all enquiries.

    • replyEnquiry

      public void replyEnquiry(int enquiryId, String reply) throws Exception
      Replies to a specific enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to.
      reply - The reply message to be sent.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the reply is empty, the enquiry is not found, or the manager is not authorized to reply.

    • generateReport

      public List<Application> generateReport()
      Generates a report of all booked applications.
      Returns:
      A list of applications with the status BOOKED.

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public void toggleProjectVisibility(String projectName) throws Exception
      Toggles the visibility of a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project whose visibility is to be toggled.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the project is not found.

    • viewAllApplications

      public List<Application> viewAllApplications()
      Retrieves all applications.
      Returns:
      A list of all applications.
